item.title: 'Father of our democracy': Kenya's Raila Odinga dies in India aged 80
item.description: President Ruto leads the tributes to Kenya's former prime minister and long-time opposition leader.

item.title: Watch: Freed detainee finds family alive after thinking they had been killed
item.description: Shadi Abu Sido told the BBC an Israeli prison officer said his family had been killed.

item.title: ChatGPT will soon allow erotica for verified adults, says OpenAI boss
item.description: CEO Sam Altman says upcoming versions of the popular chatbot would enable it to behave in a more human-like way - "but only if you want it".

item.title: Hostage families confirm identities of three of four bodies handed over by Hamas
item.description: Hamas has yet to return 21 hostages' bodies as agreed under a ceasefire deal brokered by the US.

item.title: 'He transformed R&B forever' - Stars pay tribute to D’Angelo, after his death at 51
item.description: The Grammy-winning singer, who died of cancer, "transformed R&B forever", says Beyoncé.
